Karen Gonzales
Project Manager at Wells Fargo
March 11, 2016, Karen managed Marina directly

I've had the opportunity to partner with Marina for 7+ years at Schwab.  In my 35 year Technology career, I've had the pleasure to work with many smart and talented people.  Simply put, Marina is one of the best.  Her work ethic is legendary, she's technical, smart, a thorough QA professional, a polished manager and widely respected by her business partners, global vendors, development team and others.  One of her more outstanding traits is her common sense which she leverages very well to deliver quality releases and projects to our valued clients.  It's been a pleasure and privilege to work with Marina.  I appreciate her extraordinary efforts and wish her all the best in her endeavors.

summary: Seasoned leader with 20 + years of experience in software engineering, quality insurance and finance. Strong leadership and management skills with emphasis on process improvements to optimize performance and quality of the product.Excellent communicator with planning and collaboration skills, proven record of successfully delivered critical and large scale projects. Constantly focus on innovation, team building, and cross-organizational partnerships. Successful in on-boarding and growing new talents at the org level, developed solid relationship with vendors. Fully experienced professional with “can do” attitude, always ready to take on increased responsibilities in every role.Top Strengths: Responsibility, Consistency, Restorative, Context, Achiever
